subject: Baseball
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Part of Darryl Hamilton’s job with Major League Baseball requires him to scrutinize the signage that dot outfield walls to ensure that they do not hamper the ability of players and umpires to track the ball.
snippet: Part of Darryl Hamilton’s job with Major League Baseball requires him to scrutinize the signage that dot outfield walls to ensure that they do not hamper the ability of players and umpires to track the ball.
